Package btindices.indicesmanager

Class CatExplorationManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • btindices.indicesmanager.CatExplorationManager
  • public class CatExplorationManager
extends Object
    Represents a class which contains all necessary tools in order to explore an HDT file using the corresponding HDT BT Indices.
    Author:
    Maximilian Wenzel

    • Method Detail

      • loadFiles

        public void loadFiles​(String hdtPath,
                      String btIndicesPath)

      • chooseInitialClass

        public void chooseInitialClass​(int chosenIndex)
        Sets the starting point of the exploration to a set of resources which are of the corresponding type that has been specified by the user.
        Parameters:
        chosenIndex - Relates to the "classURIs" array of the BTIndexManager object.

      • chooseIncomingReachableCategory

        public void chooseIncomingReachableCategory​(int index,
                                            boolean filter)
        Chooses the incoming connection defined by the ReachableCategories object and updates the current center resource set correspondingly. If the filter variable is set to true, the current center resources are only filtered, i.e., all resources which do not have the appropriate connection are kicked out.
        Parameters:
        index - Relates to the "incomingCategories" array list of the ReachableCategories object.

      • chooseOutgoingReachableCategory

        public void chooseOutgoingReachableCategory​(int index,
                                            boolean filter)
        Chooses the outgoing connection defined by the ReachableCategories object and updates the current center resource set correspondingly. If the filter variable is set to true, the current center resources are only filtered, i.e., all resources which do not have the appropriate connection are kicked out.
        Parameters:
        index - Relates to the "outgoingCategories" array list of the ReachableCategories object.

      • chooseOutgoingPredicateConnection

        public void chooseOutgoingPredicateConnection​(int indexCat,
                                              int indexPred,
                                              boolean filter)
        Chooses the outgoing connection defined by the ConnectedPredicates object and updates the current center resource set correspondingly. If the filter variable is set to true, the current center resources are only filtered, i.e., all resources which do not have the appropriate connection are kicked out.

      • chooseIncomingPredicateConnection

        public void chooseIncomingPredicateConnection​(int indexCat,
                                              int indexPred,
                                              boolean filter)
        Chooses the incoming connection defined by the ConnectedPredicates object and updates the current center resource set correspondingly. If the filter variable is set to true, the current center resources are only filtered, i.e., all resources which do not have the appropriate connection are kicked out.

      • chooseOutgoingConnection

        public void chooseOutgoingConnection​(URI outgoingType,
                                     String predicate,
                                     boolean filter)
        Chooses the outgoing connection defined by type URI and updates the current center resource set correspondingly. If the filter variable is set to true, the current center resources are only filtered, i.e., all resources which do not have the appropriate connections are kicked out.

      • chooseOutgoingConnection

        public void chooseOutgoingConnection​(URI outgoingType,
                                     String predicate)

      • chooseIncomingConnection

        public void chooseIncomingConnection​(URI incomingType,
                                     String predicate)

      • chooseIncomingConnection

        public void chooseIncomingConnection​(URI incomingType,
                                     String predicate,
                                     boolean filter)
        Chooses the incoming connection defined by type URI and updates the current center resource set correspondingly.

      • performJoin

        public void performJoin​(String pred,
                        boolean filter)
        After the center and the chosen outsider category have been updated a join is performed in order to intialize the new center with a subset of the resource set of the outsider category. The predicate "pred" can be set in order to specify the predicate connection to the outsider category.

      • updateReachableCategories

        public void updateReachableCategories()
        Updates the reachable categories for the current center resource set.

      • updatePredicateConnections

        public void updatePredicateConnections()
        Updates the predicate connections in relation to the current center and outsider category.

      • facetedSearch

        public void facetedSearch​(String filterPred,
                          String filterResource,
                          org.rdfhdt.hdt.enums.TripleComponentRole resourceRole)
        Filters the initial center resource set by the given conditions. E.g. if resourceRole == Subject -> (filterResource, filterPred, x) with x being in the current UnifiedSet object. else -> (x, filterPred, filterResource)

      • updateExplorationState

        public void updateExplorationState​(QueryModel qm)

      • printConnectedPredicates

        public void printConnectedPredicates()
        Prints all connected predicate connections in relation to the current center and all outsider categories to the standard output.

      • printDossier

        public void printDossier()
        Calculates how much resources of each "classURIs" type are present in the current center resource set in relation to the entire number of resources of the corresponding type.

      • changeExplorationState

        public void changeExplorationState​(org.eclipse.collections.impl.set.mutable.UnifiedSet<Long> hsSubject,
                                   org.eclipse.collections.impl.set.mutable.UnifiedSet<Long> hsObject,
                                   URI centerURI)
